content.rendered:
Our Fragrant & Sweet collection is tailored for those who adore the soft perfume of fresh cut flowers in their living space. Featuring petite perfumed flower bouquets, highlighting a single seasonal flower variety for full impact. We do not add any additional foliage.

We will select the best perfumed flowers, dependent on season. Though typically consist of

  • Sweet Peas
  • Hyacinths
  • Freesias
  • Daffodils & Jonquils

Finished with our signature wrap and trailing ribbon.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this, with no two fragrant flower bouquets the same! Images are provided for illustrative purposes only. Flower dimensions and colour vary depending on seasons and availability. Please place your trust in us, to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Standard option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
